name: Birthday Party Cake Maker
description:
Hey Kids are you craving for some classic dessert? Delicious and yummy cakes, cupcakes and pancakes is the favorite of most kids. Do you love yummy cakes too? Well off course every one loves it. But can you bake it all by yourself in bakery? If your answer is no then you don’t have to worry any more as we brings Birthday Party Cake Maker 3D for all the kids. Be the best baker the world has ever seen! What flavor do you like the most Cheese, Mocha or dark chocolate fudge cake? We have gathered world best ingredients & recipes in our kitchen to make it happen for you.

Start creating your desired lovely ice cream cakes now, with lots of dress up & decoration options in bakery. Bring your dreams to life for sweet ice desserts in Birthday Party Yummy Cake Maker 3D. Birthday Party Yummy Cake Maker 3D is a cooking and maker game for kids who loves yummy ice cream cakes. Make, bake, share and eat fun filled yummy cakes. Start your day in the kitchen where all ingredients are placed on the shelf. Experience the true dessert maker environment with real chef. Pour down the milk, add flour, sugar, cream and all the other ingredients. Bake your cake & when it’s all done its time to decorate it with colorful icings strawberry, vanilla, chocolate, candies, fruits & many more.

Birthday Party Yummy Cake Maker 3D Features:
* Choose your bakery ingredients and mix them together in a baking bowl
* Turn the stove, place a pan on low heat and place the cream in the pan
* In a bowl add chunks of melted chocolate, cream, butter, sugar, flour, salt, cocoa, baking powder and vanilla extract & mix it well
* Add the prepared composition to your baking pans
* Put baking pan with composition in the oven, let it bake for some time
* The cake is ready, now you must decorate as you wish
* Add the glaze icing over your cake, cupcakes or pancakes
* Choose and add your icing design to make your cake taste great
* Accessorize your cakes to fit for any wedding, birthday party, anniversary, baby shower or any special day
* Pour flavored icing, sprinkle on with the sugary frosting candies

So put on your apron, grab your ingredients, get your mixer out and start cracking those eggs to bake yummy cake, cupcakes & pancakes :)
